name: digitalgiant
description: 🏗️ Digital Giant - Connection Economy Revolution. Empowering Connection Masters to Build Their Digital Empire

scripts.postinstall: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'Python dependencies will be installed when available'
scripts.test: python3 -m pytest tests/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Tests will run when available'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting Solidity contracts...' && npx solhint src/*.sol 2>/dev/null || echo 'Solhint not available, skipping'
scripts.build: echo 'Building Digital Giant ecosystem...' && chmod +x deploy-unykorn-ecosystem.sh
scripts.setup: npm run build && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm start to launch Digital Giant'

author: Digital Giant Team
